title: If Heritage structure listed in Grade - I needs conservation, preservation and immediate repairs and if the structure is affected due to vandalism by occupier / owner, then the Authority shall have right to acquire such heritage property and conserve its heritage value
clause_text: If Heritage structure listed in Grade - I needs conservation, preservation and immediate repairs and if the structure is affected due to vandalism by occupier / owner, then the Authority shall have right to acquire such heritage property and conserve its heritage value.
